website_summaries.verdict: These lenses may be on the expensive side, but 9 out of 10 wearers report immediate improvement on the Ishihara color blindness test. Medical students learning to draw blood will also benefit from the color correction.
pros: Arrives with several different lenses for different uses
Corrects both red-green, as well as blue-yellow deficiencies
Improves vein detection for medical professionals
cons: Frames are more functional than stylish
Many colors are altered from their natural hues
Better suited for medical use, not color blindness correction

customer_reviews.title: Where is the green?
customer_reviews.text: We have a phone system with red lights and green lights which is a problem for me being mild red/green colourblind. Wearing the glasses cuts out the green altogether! Even my wife with 20/20 colour vision cant seen the green wearing the glasses. However, I can see the figures and symbols on the colour blind test. Maybe green is a colour that is top secret and not meant to be seen....a conspiracy maybe by the CIA (Colourblindness Information Association) dnm
customer_reviews.author: Dave Mason

product_meta.title: Vino Optics Color Blindness Glasses, Sport Frame
product_meta.description: Invented and patented by scientists from Princeton and Caltech, VINO Colorblindness Glasses corrects red-green color deficiency. The only colorblindness technology in the world that augments the signal that red-green vision is designed to see. BACKGROUND: This technology was designed to amplify perception of the oxygenation signal coming from the blood under the skin. It aids color deficiency because color vision actually evolved to see these oxygenation signals from skin, so as to sense blushes, blanches, and other emotion states on bare skin, a 2006 discovery from VINO Optics scientists. Proven in studies to work: “Discrimination IMPROVED along the RG axis both for deuteranopic and deuteranomalous subjects wearing VINO OPTICS (O2Amp) glasses.” Mastey et al., Investigative Ophthalmology & Visual Science September 2016, Vol.57, 192.
feature_bullets: The original colorblind glasses technology. Corrects red-green colorblindness.
Colorblindness correction based on the science behind color vision -- the only technology that augments the signal red-green vision is actually for.
The only colorblindness correction technology that is helpful for sensing emotions and health of other people.
Based on fundamental discoveries by Caltech and Princeton scientists on the origins of color vision. O2Amp tech inside.
Made in USA. Lightweight. Fully adjustable, comfort frames. Sport frame, UV protection. Anti-fog and anti-scratch coatings.
